mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiudian_id as jiudianId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.jiudian_liuyan_content as jiudianLiuyanContent ,a.reply_content as replyContent ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiudian.jiudian_name as jiudianName ,jiudian.jiudian_types as jiudianTypes ,jiudian.jiudian_weizhi as jiudianWeizhi ,jiudian.jiudian_photo as jiudianPhoto ,jiudian.jiudian_new_money as jiudianNewMoney ,jiudian.jiudian_content as jiudianContent ,yonghu.username as username ,yonghu.password as password ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.sex_types as sexTypes ,yonghu.id_number as idNumber ,yonghu.phone as phone ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM jiudian_liuyan a left JOIN jiudian jiudian ON a.jiudian_id = jiudian.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.jiudian_id = #{params.jiudianId}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.jiudian_liuyan_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiudianLiuyanContent},'%')
and a.reply_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyContent},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and jiudian.jiudian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiudianName},'%')
and jiudian.jiudian_types = #{params.jiudianTypes}
and jiudian.jiudian_weizhi like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiudianWeizhi},'%')
and jiudian.jiudian_new_money >= #{params.jiudianNewMoneyStart}
and jiudian.jiudian_new_money <= #{params.jiudianNewMoneyEnd}
and jiudian.jiudian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiudianContent},'%')
and yonghu.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and yonghu.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and yonghu.id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.idNumber},'%')
and yonghu.phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.phone},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
